name: How To Chicken 101
description:
Live your life as a chicken from hatching, learn to walk, eat, mate with female chicks and ..... Features
  • Seven Achievement *Collect Them All*
  • Multiple Endings
  • Duck Reference *hehe*
  • Pok Pok & Quack Quack
  • Chicken Life Simulator
Controls
  • Right Button Click  = Move/Interact
  • Middle Button Click = Jump Down
  • Left Button Click = Jump
  • Escape = Restart/Main Menu
Credits
  • Giovanny (GD, Art, Engineer)
  • Axel (Music Producer)
  • Royalty Free (Sound FX)
  • @jason_saputr (Playtester)
Thank You

Hi everyone we hope you're doing well during this covid19 pandemic. This is our first game that we ever made. Any feedback about the game would be appreciated, if you encounter any bugs please help us by reporting it. So we can fix it ASAP!

We haven't tested for mac/linux platform, if you are using mac/linux please support us by testing and provide feedback. Thank you
